location.name: Road
location.description: You are on a crossroad in the middle of nowhere, sign indicates that you could go to the forest, the hill, a building or into the valley.

location.name: Hill
location.description: A green hill with a sheep on it, you can see the forest at the bottom of one side.

location.name: Forest
location.description: A calm little forest, are these piglets ? Anyway, you can access to the road you were at the beginning.

location.name: Building
location.description: An old red brick building, there are junk all over the place, but there are no other way than the one you came from, the road.

location.name: Valley
location.description: A nice valley with a little stream in the middle. It leads right into an hill or you could go back to the road.
